channel.title: jekyll on NS
channel.description: Recent content in jekyll on NS

item.title: Migrating My Site From Jekyll to Hugo
item.description: I’ve been utilizing Jekyll for the past few months now to build my website. Although it does a pretty good job at doing so, I’ve been taking a look at Hugo and experimenting with it alongside it. After I was able to replicate the website and setup a theme for it, I ended up migrating the entire site and the posts with it, making sure everything was nicely organized. Although I’ve archived the old site, I still host it with GitHub Pages and have otherwise changed the URL, you could still access it here.

item.title: Starting This Site
item.description: So it’s been quite the journey figuring out the ins & outs of setting up a blog and writing posts in markdown. So I figured I may as well write about it.
